title: Timbuktu Cultural Heritage Center
description: Explore vibrant exhibits of traditional art, music, and crafts that celebrate local heritage.

title: River Niger Canoe Experience
description: Take a peaceful paddle or scenic motorboat ride through the Niger River and watch fishermen at work.

title: Timbuktu Crafts Market
description: Shop handwoven fabrics, beaded jewelry, and hand-carved sculptures by local artisans.

title: Sacred Baobab Tree Tour
description: Visit the legendary Baobab tree that is been standing for centuries and holds cultural stories.

title: Timbuktu Open-Air Food Festival
description: Sample spicy suya, jollof rice, puff-puff, and zobo in an open square filled with local music.

title: Childrens Story Garden
description: A colorful park where elders tell folk tales under mango trees. Great for families and schools.

title: Drum & Dance Nights
description: Join locals in a weekly celebration of drumming, dancing, and traditional attire.

title: Cultural Dress Photo Booth
description: Try on native attire and take professional photos to share as souvenirs.

title: Timbuktu Museum of History
description: Explore artifacts and learn about the ancient trade routes and local legends.

title: Wildlife Walk at Kudu Hills
address: Kudu Hills Trail, Outskirts of Timbuktu
description: Take a guided walk through natural terrain and see monkeys, exotic birds, and native flora.
